title: League is to expensive for me

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body: Just wanted to say goodbye to all of you, it has been a great ride. I simply cannot afford league anymore, so far it has cost me 1 keyboard, 2 mouses , 1 pair headphones and now this , my 500$ monitor.

replies.body: Here's to hoping you find other ways to handle your anger/frustration other than hitting whatever's in front of you. I'm somewhat skeptical that League will be the only thing in your life that makes you feel that way.
you know this is in memes and games right?

Why watch youtube videos when you could be playing League of Legends! It's free! It's none of that pay to win garbage. Well I'm sorry rich guy but go buy yourself an island and afford things.
I'm trying to play League over here with my friends, who exists.
Oh and btw goodbye go hire a psycharatrist for your anger issues you uncontrollable ape.
Geeze...you may need to talk to someone about that frustration and anger you have there....
